Supported Cameras

I make and sell a variety of products for the following cameras:

  • Belair X 6-12 medium format camera
  • Blackbird, fly 35mm film camera
  • Diana 120 medium format camera, including these models
    • Diana+
    • Diana F+
    • Vintage Diana (1960s) and Clone cameras
  • Diana Baby 110 film camera
  • Diana Instant Square Instax square format camera
  • Diana Mini 35mm film camera
  • Holga 120 medium format camera, including these models
    • Holga 120CFN
    • Holga 120FN
    • Holga 120GCFN
    • Holga 120GFN
    • Holga 120GN
    • Holga 120GTLR
    • Holga 120N
    • Holga 120PAN (Panoramic)
    • Holga 120PC (Pinhole Camera)
    • Holga 120S
    • Holga 120SF
    • Holga 120TLR
  • Holga 135 35mm film camera
    • Holga 135
    • Holga 135BC
    • Holga 135FC
  • LOMO LC-A 35mm film camera
  • LomoApparat 35mm film camera
  • Sprocket Rocket 35mm film camera, including these models
    • Sprocket Rocket Version 1.0
    • Sprocket Rocket Version 2.0

Manufacturing

3D printed in PETG, finished and posted from the United Kingdom. I chose PETG as it is a strong material and the design, although it looks delicate, it is robust.

Questions

If you have any questions please get in touch.
